title: Graph ping data
text: can install development version ping GitHub :

title: Graph ping data
text: example, reading data .txt file included package:
code: library(ping) fs::path_package(   package = "ping",   "extdata/data_2023-11-20.txt") |>   process_pings_file() |>   autoplot() #> Extracted start time from first row of input file: 13H 34M 35S

title: `autoplot()` method for `
code: # S3 method for pings autoplot(object, log_y = FALSE, ...)

title: `autoplot()` method for `
text: object `"pings"` object created using [process_pings_file()] log_y whether display y axis logarithmic spacing ... unused

title: `autoplot()` method for `
code: fs::path_package(   package = "ping",   "extdata/data_2023-11-20.txt") |> process_pings_file() |> autoplot() #> Extracted start time from first row of input file: 13H 34M 35S

title: Import ping data — process_pings_file
text: file path file containing ping data start_time optional start time align data

title: Import ping data — process_pings_file
code: data1 = fs::path_package(   package = "ping",   "extdata/data_2023-11-20.txt") |> process_pings_file() #> Extracted start time from first row of input file: 13H 34M 35S
